> May i be so bold to ask WHY we are not allowed to post pictures directly from our computers?

To post pictures directly from your computer means uploading them directly to the SQUAD servers.

If everyone's pictures were stored on the SQUAD servers, they would use up valuable hard disk space, and the increased traffic from everyone attempting to view those pictures would exceeding the allowable bandwidth - SQUAD's ISP would end up shutting down the servers and forums for breaching capacity.

Very few companies can afford hosting of very large numbers of images, and even then, it's restricted to dedicated image hosts like imgur and Photobucket.
In addition to the storage concern sumghai mentions, the attachments system was found to have security loopholes, and so has been disabled.
